step.cmd: Create a class which implements com.odcgroup.workbench.generation.cartridge.CodeGenerator (i.e. extends com.odcgroup.mdf.generation.OAWGenerator to create a OAW based generator)
Create a new cartridge by right clicking > New > cartridge
Give the cartridge an id (i.e. com.odcgroup.mdf.api.generator)
Give the cartridge a category (i.e. API (Domain))
Define if the cartridge is activated by default
Reference the class created at step 2
Create the OAW workflow and the necessary xpt/ext files
